text: 1:21 Luk 1:31; 2:21; Aposel 4:12; 13:23; 13:38An otarim bateghtɨma, eghtɨ a uan gumazamizibar arazir kuraba gɨn amadagh men akurvagham. Kamaghɨn nɨ ziam Iesus a datɨgh.”1:21 Ziam Iesus Hibrun akamɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam ko magh ghu, “Ekiam, a gumazamiziba ua me iniamin gumazim.” Ziam Iesus Grighɨn akam. Me Hibrun akamɨn ziam, “Josua,” Iesus garɨsi.
